alethinophidia.pawns

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • alethinophidia.pawns.Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Just as name implies - it's an item. Item class is used to draw and place all that fancy stuff for our snake to eat.
    Author:
    £ukasz Piotrowski
